The §6Stellar Energy Conduit§r is the §efinal tier of the §6Energy Conduit§rs and is capable of §eoutputting a maximum of 2M µI/t§r.

To make the Stellar Energy Conduit, you will need six §6Conduit Binder§rs, two §6Infinity Reagent§r, and a §6Stellar Alloy Ingot§r.
To make a Stellar Alloy Ingot, throw four §6Clay§r, a §6Nether Star§r, and a §6Melodic Alloy Ingot§r into an §6Alloy Smelter§r.
